name: DjangoChannels

aliases.name: StreamHandler
aliases.comment: StreamHandler defines how we should deal with a specific stream.
aliases.type: { streamName : String , instanceDecoder : Json.Decode.Decoder instanceType , pkDecoder : Json.Decode.Decoder pkType , createFunc : instanceType -> pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) , updateFunc : instanceType -> pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) , deleteFunc : pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) }

values.name: defaultCreate
values.comment: Default function for creating an instance.
values.type: instanceType -> pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType )

values.name: defaultDelete
values.comment: Default function for deleting an instance given a pk.
values.type: pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType )

values.name: defaultUpdate
values.comment: Default function for updating an instance.
values.type: instanceType -> pkType -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType )

values.name: handleStream
values.comment: Handle data on a given StreamHandler.
values.type: DjangoChannels.StreamHandler instanceType pkType -> String -> List ( pkType, instanceType ) -> List ( pkType, instanceType )

values.name: streamDemultiplexer
values.comment: Deal with streams from a WebsocketDemultiplexer.
